keyMoments.title: Ian's Debut in Flashback
keyMoments.description: Ian appears in the flashback as the Raiding Captain of the Wetton Pirates, chasing the Pumpkin Pirates alongside Wetton before being trapped in the Rainbow Mist.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Ian as a secondary antagonist who has been imprisoned in Ape's Concert for fifty years.

relationships.description: Ian serves as Raiding Captain under pirate captain Wetton.

evolutionMoments.description: Ian is shown chasing the Pumpkin Pirates alongside Wetton during the attack on Ruluka.

reveals.information: Raiding Captain of the Wetton Pirates
Trapped in Rainbow Mist for fifty years while chasing the Pumpkin Pirates

keyMoments.title: Pumpkin Pirates Introduction
keyMoments.description: Rapanui reveals himself and the Pumpkin Pirates to the Straw Hats, threatening them with a bomb if they don't leave Ape's Concert.
keyMoments.significance: First direct interaction with the Straw Hats as the leader of the children guarding the ship graveyard.
keyMoments.quote: We are the Pumpkin Pirates! Leave now or we'll set off this bomb!

keyMoments.title: Recognized by Henzo
keyMoments.description: Henzo recognizes Rapanui as one of his childhood friends who disappeared fifty years ago, still appearing as a child due to the time distortion in the Rainbow Mist.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the emotional core of the arc and Henzo's connection to the Pumpkin Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Pumpkin Pirates Formation
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows young Rapanui and friends forming the Pumpkin Pirates, dreaming of becoming real pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the origins of the Pumpkin Pirates and their childhood dreams.

abilities.description: Rapanui can flick coins at high velocity using his fingers, capable of demolishing warships.

relationships.description: Childhood friend who was separated when Henzo fell overboard fifty years ago.

evolutionMoments.description: Henzo recognizes Rapanui after fifty years of searching for him and the other Pumpkin Pirates.

relationships.description: Fellow member of the Pumpkin Pirates.

reveals.information: Captain of the Pumpkin Pirates and Henzo's childhood friend
Trapped in Rainbow Mist for fifty years, hasn't aged due to time distortion

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Pumpkin Pirate Member
keyMoments.description: Isoka appears alongside the other Pumpkin Pirates, revealed as the only female member of the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Isoka as part of the group guarding Ape's Concert.

keyMoments.title: Recognized as Henzo's Friend
keyMoments.description: Henzo recognizes Isoka as one of his childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the emotional reunion between Henzo and his lost friends.

relationships.description: Childhood friend and fellow Pumpkin Pirate.

reveals.information: Only female member of the Pumpkin Pirates

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Pumpkin Pirate Member
keyMoments.description: Akibi appears with the Pumpkin Pirates, helping to guard Ape's Concert from intruders.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Akibi as part of Henzo's childhood friend group.

relationships.description: Childhood friend and fellow Pumpkin Pirate.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Pumpkin Pirate Member
keyMoments.description: Rongo, the youngest member of the Pumpkin Pirates, appears with his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Rongo as the youngest of Henzo's childhood friends.

relationships.description: Childhood friend and fellow Pumpkin Pirate, the youngest of the group.

reveals.information: Youngest member of the Pumpkin Pirates

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Pumpkin Pirate Member
keyMoments.description: Pukau appears with the Pumpkin Pirates, showing his archery skills.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Pukau as a skilled archer among the Pumpkin Pirates.

abilities.description: Pukau demonstrates considerable archery skill, capable of accurately targeting objects from a great distance.

relationships.description: Childhood friend and fellow Pumpkin Pirate.

keyMoments.title: Entering Ape's Concert
keyMoments.description: Henzo enters Ape's Concert with the Straw Hats, finally reaching the place where his friends have been trapped for fifty years.
keyMoments.significance: Culmination of Henzo's fifty-year quest to find his lost friends.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Childhood Friends
keyMoments.description: Henzo recognizes the Pumpkin Pirates as his childhood friends who disappeared fifty years ago, leading to an emotional reunion.
keyMoments.significance: The emotional climax of Henzo's character arc, revealing his deep connection to the Pumpkin Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: It can't be... Rapanui? Isoka? Is it really you?

keyMoments.title: Henzo's Separation from Friends
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals how Henzo fell overboard during their escape from Wetton, separating him from his friends as they entered the Rainbow Mist.
keyMoments.significance: Explains why Henzo aged normally while his friends remained children, and establishes his motivation for researching the Rainbow Mist.

relationships.description: Childhood friend who Henzo has been searching for over fifty years.

evolutionMoments.description: Henzo reunites with Rapanui after fifty years of research to find him.

reveals.information: Former member of the Pumpkin Pirates who fell overboard during their escape from Wetton
Spent fifty years researching the Rainbow Mist to rescue his childhood friends

keyMoments.title: Wetton's Attack on Ruluka
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows Wetton as a pirate captain attacking and burning down Ruluka Island fifty years ago, forcing the Pumpkin Pirates to flee.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Wetton as the primary antagonist whose actions led to the Pumpkin Pirates being trapped in the Rainbow Mist.

abilities.description: Mechanical suit equipped with flamethrowers. Signature attack is 'Silver Barbecue'.

relationships.description: Ian serves as Raiding Captain under Wetton.

reveals.information: Former pirate who attacked Ruluka Island fifty years ago, now serves as mayor
Main antagonist responsible for the Pumpkin Pirates' predicament
